Name: 99+ Wooden Stick
Description: A smooth wooden stick that has been reinforced 99 times. Essential beginner weapon.

Name: Iron Sword
Description: Forged in the Emberforge’s heart, this blade hums with raw might, cleaving through steel as easily as dawn shatters night.

Name: Wooden Shield
Description: Hewn from Verdant Vale’s ancient oaks, this shield stands steadfast, turning deadly strikes into harmless echoes.

Name: Leather Helmet
Description: Moon-tanned and desert-kissed, this helmet fits like a protective whisper, muffling incoming shards and stray blows.

Name: Leather Armor
Description: Woven from storm-serpent hide, this chestpiece shimmers with silver resilience, deflecting assaults while you move freely.

Name: Leather Leggings
Description: Stitched from a serpentine hide, these leggings murmur with every step, cloaking your legs in stealthy durability.

Name: Leather Boots
Description: Worn along endless pilgrim paths, these boots grant nimble grace to every step, carrying you safely through peril.

Name: Ring of Luck
Description: Cast in midnight silver and crowned with a four-leaf crest, this ring bends fortune’s whim to your favor at every turn.

Name: Steel Axe
Description: Hewn from northern forges and tempered in glacier-water, this axe cleaves through shields like a thunderbolt.

Name: Mithril Dagger
Description: Fashioned of moonlit mithril, its blade dances with deadly grace, striking foes before they can draw breath.

Name: Crystal Staff
Description: Carved from the heart of a fallen star, this staff pulses with life, restoring vigor to the weary.

Name: Bronze Helm
Description: Cast from the first light of dawn, this helm rings out like a clarion against any incoming blow.

Name: Chainmail Armor
Description: Woven by master smiths, each interlocking ring shimmers with resilience, shrugging off the fiercest strikes.

Name: Agile Gloves
Description: Sewn from wind-silk and blessed by a swift wind spirit, these gloves make every gesture a blur.

Name: Boots of Swiftness
Description: Imbued with the essence of a coursing river, these boots carry you faster than your own heartbeat.

Name: Amulet of Vitality
Description: Set with a vibrant emerald, this amulet hums with life’s pulse, mending wounds as if by nature’s grace.
